title: Scenario-Based e-Learning for Enhancing Inclusive Leadership and Innovative Work Behavior in SMEs

context.prior_knowledge: Workplace communication skills and grasp of basic leadership principles
context.additional_context: Participants simulate inclusive leadership strategies in virtual scenarios based on real SME cases, learning via personal devices in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners will apply three inclusive leadership strategies tailored to employee types (participatory problem-solving, psychological safety building, empowerment) to real-world cases.
Learners will design and implement a 5-step collaborative process to promote innovative work behavior (IWB).
Learners will improve inclusive leadership practice levels by 20% or more through scenario-based assessments.

resources: SME (Small and Medium Enterprise) Case Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
